fields.headline: Miss Earth 2009: a pretty good cause
fields.bodyText: Ahoy there, green goddesses! Are you outgoing and friendly, do you have a cause and - most important - do you have "beauty of face and proportionate body structure"? Well, the heats are coming up for Miss Earth 2009 and the winner ("the ninth wonder of the world") will become an official spokesperson for the United Nations Environment Programme. Despair not! This is the only beauty pageant officially supported by both the UN and the US government's department of energy. As one Filipino critic said after last year's finals in Manila: "It was an astounding night, leaving every viewer spectacled with the event."
